title: Ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository that lets you run Llama 2, Code Llama, and other large language models locally with a simple CLI.

title: ollama-node
summary: Official Node.js client library for Ollama, making it easy to integrate local LLMs into JavaScript/TypeScript apps.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, offering a clean API to chat with and manage local models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Lightweight JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API, published on npm with full TypeScript definitions.

title: ollama-python on PyPI
summary: PyPI distribution of the official Ollama Python client; install with pip and start chatting with local models in one line.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM backend for chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama, featuring chat history, model switching, and markdown support.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive CLI chat wrapper around Ollama with conversation history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative with inline completions.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model; supports slash commands and streaming replies.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Official example repo showing how to build a local RAG pipeline with Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI for Ollama with session memory and model selector, deployable with one Docker command.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs for chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate offering strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with tokio support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Go client for Ollama with idiomatic interfaces and built-in retry/backoff for robust local LLM calls.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing code against local LLMs.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama that listens for mentions and replies using configurable local models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant sidebar powered by any Ollama model for note-taking help.
